text: Hello people, i have a problem with the indexation of my blog entries... Google is catching every article post on my blog and i was trying to find a way or an option to this from COS but doesn´t look that be that easy... Does anyone have any clue or solution about this??? I really appreciate if you can help me. Regards :smile:

<@UD5GXJW1M> I think you’ll get better help for this in <#C22PU4LV8|general> though I think you just need to set your blog post titles to be actual titles and not numbers. And your blog url to not be /blog/page
